title: Journal of a Residence in Scotland, and Tour through England, France, Germany, Switzerland and Italy. With a memoir of the author and extracts from his religious papers. ... Compiled by I. MacLellan, Jr
author: Maclellan, Henry B.
snippet: Thursday. Dined with Rev. Henry Gray, InverleithRow. Had the pleasure of meeting Rev. Mr Lundayof Kelso, husband of the lady who has just written thememoirs of Rev. Mr Bruen, and also with Mrs , theauthoress of Pierre and his Family.
